title: libert19
author: libert19
content: Profile >> modify profile >> look and layout preferences >> time off-set I want 5:30, can only choose in 5/6.

comments.author: PowerGlove
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on July 20, 2022, 04:08:49 AMProfile >> modify profile >> look and layout preferences >> time off-set I want 5:30, can only choose in 5/6. Try typing in "5.5" (without the quotes). I just tested it and it should work.
